description:
The previous revision i made i had made a mistake by having the bass drum syncopated with the hihat on the blast beats bars. Now the bass drum's locked in with the hihat in 8th notes.
(via editor)
title: Dreaming

description:
I modified the bars 13-19, 45-51 and 117-123 since the previous revision had 16th hihats and no snare hits, when in the song you can hear a blast beat with snare and hihat in 8th notes.
(via editor)
title: Dreaming
